attributes.action: VOTE OF "NO CONFIDENCE" IN PRESENT BRITISH GOVERNMENT
attributes.additional_details:
This present governments policies are not working and are causing more harm to Britain's safety, reputation, wealth and employment than good. The very large reduction in Britains Armed Forces leaves this country open to attack  this country will be unable to defend Britain let alone the Falkland Islands with the proposed depletion of our armed forces. Present economic policies are inept and not working as there is no cohesive plan which incorporates the creation of jobs. Policies to fill loopholes in taxation especially of forign non-tax paying companies is laughable. Our expendature to the EU far outstips what we get back.
Therfore The Prime Minister Should resign and an immediate general election called.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
